title: Designing of web-page (web-application) for record studio
description: Info page about record studio and its services
responsibilities: Design, application structure and functional development

title: Localization of iOS application for Allergan company
description: iOS medical application for presentations and classification of implants in plastic surgery. In project were implemented translations on all main european languages
responsibilities: Implementation of translations in application, correction of styles, logical errors, and images, testing

title: Development of blog for game developing company BidonGames
description: Blog for subject articles to attract attention of the target audience to the products developed by the company. The project presupposes administrative services conducted by administrators and authors of articles to  add and edit materials. User services allow post loading without reloading of the page, reposting in the social network.
responsibilities: Development of logical and visual functional of blog, testing

title: Optimization of website running for game developing company Bidon Games
description: Refactoring and code minimization, optimization of image files, speeding up response time and download process. Research and analysis of the web pages of the European servers. Work with Google Optimizer

title: Exaloc — web platform for betting on sporting events
description: Web platform is designed for the implementation of a series of bets on sporting events in the world. Used in Europe and Africa
responsibilities: Design of sub-modules, back-end coding, implementation of UI design

title: Artel Outsourcing Group - a web service for developers and customers of outsourcing
description: Landing-pages, pages for projects, forms of registration, user profiles. Authorization of users via Github, Stack Overflow, Odesk. System for project rate evaluation
responsibilities: Development of templates for the layout, realization of animations and scripts, JS-development applications for registration, authorization of users, evaluating and commenting on project

title: Chat with multimedia support on Node.js
description: Chat with the possibility of adding of images, videos, pieces of code and icons to display emotions to the posts. Designed on the basis of Node.js and  Socket.IO
responsibilities: The development of the functional for analysis of multimedia messages in order to filter links, images, videos and icons to display emotions. Implementation of the algorithm for downloading message history on the specified criteria. Adaptation for mobile application

title: Web application Intrade24 - system of online trading in the Forex market
description: System Intrade24 for brokers who trade on the Forex stock exchange, with personal pages, statistics, scores, accounts and bonuses
responsibilities: Development of templates for the layout, development of js-scripts for routing, page generating, controllers, audio player, sound effects

title: Web application Pay4User - system of granting loans with the Webmoney
description: System Pay4User is designed for lending with the Webmoney
responsibilities: Development of templates for the layout, development of js-scripts for routing, page generating, controllers, audio player

title: Exaloc — web platform for betting on sporting events
description: Web platform is designed for the implementation of a series of bets on sporting events in the world. Used in Europe and Africa
responsibilities: Design of sub-modules, back-end coding, implementation of UI design

title: Whale Creative Agency landing page
description: Info landing-page about creative agency and its services
